strapiPost.title: Survival Exhibition At The Jones Center Extended
strapiPost.content:
If you haven't had the chance to enjoy “The Worst-Case Scenario Survival Experience” at The Jones Center, the immersive, STEM-based exhibition is extended through Jan 12, 2023, due to popular demand.

  • Put yourself to the test: “The Worst Case Scenario Survival Experience” engages guests in active problem-solving and hilarious full-body play as they put real-world survival skills to the test in scenarios like landing a plane, escaping quicksand, or outsmarting a mountain lion! 
  • Plan your visit: Reservations are available for parties and groups on Monday through Wednesday, with general admission available Thursday through Sunday. The exhibition is presented in English and Spanish, with Marshallese translations available. 

Reservations for groups and parties are filling up fast! Schedule your group HERE.
